element.name: TFilterRule
element.short: A single rule as part of a filter

element.name: TFilterRule.Init
element.short: Init sets all Data except the Concat type

element.name: TEnumHejConcType
element.short: TEnumHejConcType defines concatination-types between single FilteRules

element.name: TEnumHejCompareType
element.short: TEnumHejCompareType defines the comparation type of the FilterRule

element.name: TFilterRule.Clear
element.short: Clear reset all data to default (empty) values

element.name: TGenFilter
element.short: TGenFilter is a complete filter containing a list of rules and their concatination

element.name: TGenFilter.SingleEval
element.short: SingleEval evaluates the complete filter against a single Individual
